title: India adds 1.7 GW solar power capacity in July
description: In July, Indiaâ€™s solar power capacity increased by 1,733.7 MW, reaching 87.2 GW overall, according to the ministry of new and renewable energy. Since the start of FY25, 5,394 MW has been added. Moody's indicates India needs substantial investments to meet its 2030 renewable energy target of 500 GW.
